type: FUNCTIONAL PROCUREMENT NOTICE (2-PHASE) - SPECIALIZED PUBLIC BUILDING CONSTRUCTION SERVICES
short_summary: The RCMP requires a contractor to provide tenant improvements in Kelowna, BC, at Penno Road. The work involves creating an office space to meet RCMP program requirements.
description: Retain a contractor to provide construction services for tenant improvements in Kelowna, BC. The project consists of creating an office space that meets RCMP program requirements. Work is restricted to within property lines and tenant space, but may require access to other areas of the building.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Brief Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a tender announcement for a construction project for tenant improvements at the RCMP’s suite in Kelowna, British Columbia.

### Project Details
#### Contract Information

*   **Contract Title:** Kelowna Penno Road – Expansion Construction
*   **Reference Number:** cb-913-10786120
*   **Amendment Number:** 7
*   **Solicitation Number:** 202401236/A
*   **Publication Date:** October 11, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, at 5:00 PM (AST)
*   **Amendment Date:** November 10, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Requirements

*   **Procurement Category:** CNST
*   **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

*   The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is subject to Canada’s trade agreements, including:
    *   Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Location and Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   909–14200 Green Timbers Way, Surrey, BC V3T 6P3, Canada

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Bev Martin
*   **Email:** <beverly.martin@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>
*   **Phone:** (604) 679–8264

### Notice and Attachments

*   The tender notice, including the following attachments, can be found at [URL](#urlsLink).

    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21904/202401236-01\_itt\_two\_phase\_kelowna\_final-amd01-2023-10-12.pdf
